alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Gwinnett (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 3:26PM EDT until August 27 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Barrow County in north central Georgia... Eastern Gwinnett County in north central Georgia... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 326 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lawrenceville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lawrenceville, Winder, Snellville, Suwanee, Buford, Braselton, Auburn, Dacula, Grayson, Bethlehem, Carl, Fort Yargo State Park, County Line, Harbin, Chateau Elan, and Hog Mountain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
